#summary Allows control over how many extras a marine starts out with.
#labels D-Cvar,Obsolete

= Description =

This cvar has been replaced with a set of cvars to enable specific control over how many extras a marine will start out with.

See the following commands:

  *[[asw_bonus_charges_hornets]
  *[[asw_bonus_charges_mines_fire]
  *[[asw_bonus_charges_mines_laser]
  *[[asw_bonus_charges_smart_bomb]
  *[[asw_bonus_charges_stun_grenade]
  *[[asw_bonus_charges_tesla_trap]
